mapper.sql: business_system_name_short_name, data_source_schema, data_source_table, data_source_col_name, business_system_ID, data_source_table_comment, data_source_col_order, data_source_col_primarykey_flag, data_source_col_isnull_flag, data_source_col_datatype, data_source_col_len, data_source_col_precision, data_source_col_scale, data_source_col_comment, data_source_col_datalake_flag, last_modify_dt, last_modify_by
mapper.select: select col.business_system_ID as business_system_ID, col.business_system_name_short_name as business_system_name_short_name, col.data_source_schema as data_source_schema, col.data_source_table as data_source_table, col.data_source_table_comment as data_source_table_comment, col.data_source_col_name as data_source_col_name, col.data_source_col_primarykey_flag as data_source_col_primarykey_flag, col.data_source_col_isnull_flag as data_source_col_isnull_flag, col.data_source_col_datatype as data_source_col_datatype, col.data_source_col_len as data_source_col_len, col.data_source_col_precision as data_source_col_precision, col.data_source_col_scale as data_source_col_scale, col.data_source_col_comment as data_source_col_comment, IFNULL(rule.rule_col_2,'string') as col_mapper FROM cj_data_source_tab_col_info col left JOIN cj_dw_crt_tab_rule_info rule on UPPER(col.data_source_col_datatype)=UPPER(rule.rule_col_1) where business_system_name_short_name = #{businessSystemNameShortName} and data_source_schema = #{dataSourceSchema} and data_source_table = #{dataSourceTable} order by col.data_source_col_order asc

select
distinct
from cj_data_source_tab_col_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into cj_data_source_tab_col_info (business_system_name_short_name, data_source_schema, data_source_table, data_source_col_name, business_system_ID, data_source_table_comment, data_source_col_order, data_source_col_primarykey_flag, data_source_col_isnull_flag, data_source_col_datatype, data_source_col_len, data_source_col_precision, data_source_col_scale, data_source_col_comment, data_source_col_datalake_flag, last_modify_dt, last_modify_by) values (#{businessSystemNameShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataSourceSchema,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataSourceTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataSourceColName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessSystemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataSourceTableComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataSourceColOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataSourceColPrimarykeyFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{dataSourceColIsnullFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{dataSourceColDatatype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataSourceColLen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataSourceColPrecision,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataSourceColScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataSourceColComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataSourceColDatalakeFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lastModifyDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into cj_data_source_tab_col_info
business_system_name_short_name,
data_source_schema,
data_source_table,
data_source_col_name,
business_system_ID,
data_source_table_comment,

last_modify_dt,

mapper.update:
update cj_data_source_tab_col_info
business_system_name_short_name = #{record.businessSystemNameShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data_source_schema = #{record.dataSourceSchema,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data_source_table = #{record.dataSourceTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data_source_col_name = #{record.dataSourceColName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
business_system_ID = #{record.businessSystemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update cj_data_source_tab_col_info
business_system_ID = #{businessSystemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data_source_table_comment = #{dataSourceTableComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data_source_col_order = #{dataSourceColOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data_source_col_primarykey_flag = #{dataSourceColPrimarykeyFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
data_source_col_isnull_flag = #{dataSourceColIsnullFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
data_source_col_datatype = #{dataSourceColDatatype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data_source_col_len = #{dataSourceColLen,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data_source_col_precision = #{dataSourceColPrecision,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data_source_col_scale = #{dataSourceColScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data_source_col_comment = #{dataSourceColComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data_source_col_datalake_flag = #{dataSourceColDatalakeFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
last_modify_dt = #{lastModifyDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_modify_by = #{lastModifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where business_system_name_short_name = #{businessSystemNameShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and data_source_schema = #{dataSourceSchema,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and data_source_table = #{dataSourceTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and data_source_col_name = #{dataSourceColName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update cj_data_source_tab_col_info set business_system_ID = #{businessSystemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_source_table_comment = #{dataSourceTableComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_source_col_order = #{dataSourceColOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_source_col_primarykey_flag = #{dataSourceColPrimarykeyFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, data_source_col_isnull_flag = #{dataSourceColIsnullFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, data_source_col_datatype = #{dataSourceColDatatype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_source_col_len = #{dataSourceColLen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_source_col_precision = #{dataSourceColPrecision,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_source_col_scale = #{dataSourceColScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_source_col_comment = #{dataSourceColComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_source_col_datalake_flag = #{dataSourceColDatalakeFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, last_modify_dt = #{lastModifyDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_modify_by = #{lastModifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where business_system_name_short_name = #{businessSystemNameShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and data_source_schema = #{dataSourceSchema,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and data_source_table = #{dataSourceTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and data_source_col_name = #{dataSourceColName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into cj_data_source_tab_col_info (business_system_name_short_name, data_source_schema, data_source_table, data_source_col_name, business_system_ID, data_source_table_comment, data_source_col_order, data_source_col_primarykey_flag, data_source_col_isnull_flag, data_source_col_datatype, data_source_col_len, data_source_col_precision, data_source_col_scale, data_source_col_comment, data_source_col_datalake_flag, last_modify_dt, last_modify_by) values
(#{item.businessSystemNameShortName}, #{item.dataSourceSchema}, #{item.dataSourceTable}, #{item.dataSourceColName}, #{item.businessSystemId}, #{item.dataSourceTableComment}, #{item.dataSourceColOrder}, #{item.dataSourceColPrimarykeyFlag}, #{item.dataSourceColIsnullFlag}, #{item.dataSourceColDatatype}, #{item.dataSourceColLen}, #{item.dataSourceColPrecision}, #{item.dataSourceColScale}, #{item.dataSourceColComment}, #{item.dataSourceColDatalakeFlag}, #{item.lastModifyDt}, #{item.lastModifyBy})
